name: TalkGroundskeeper
_source: speak;OldMan1;Ah, a visitor! Welcome to Lord Ebert's gardens.
speak;OldMan1;Lord Ebert prides himself on them.{w}{br}They are, after all, the mark of a great house.
speak;Simon;Are the boxes supposed to be... art?
speak;OldMan1;They are a novel take on the traditional sculpture garden.{w}{br}Each is a relic of the ancient Lord Vesner's gravity experiments.
speak;Simon;I've heard his name mentioned.{w} What exactly are these relics?
speak;OldMan1;Lord Ebert invites his guests to see for themselves.{w}{br}Four puzzles lay throughout the garden.
speak;OldMan1;Complete each puzzle, and a marvelous prize awaits.
speak;Simon;Hmm.{w} Very well, then.{w}{br}Thank you for your time.
